Pre-Game Insights: The Philadelphia Phillies will look to Kyle Schwarber for continued offensive production when they hit the field against Jesus Sanchez and the Miami Marlins on Sunday.
The Phillies are fourth in the majors with a .260 batting average.
The Marlins’ 131 home runs rank 27th in MLB this season.
The game is scheduled for Sunday, September 8, 2024, at 1:40 p.m. ET at LoanDepot Park in Miami, Florida.
The game will be broadcast on Bally Sports and available for live streaming on Fubo.
